unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja's knee? Hope Dr. Sharma is on it. Heard Bumrah's back is still troubling him. Recover quickly, paaji! Our World Cup hopes depend on it. This is worse than waiting in line at the Tirupati temple. Need them fit for the match at Wankhede. Heard they are building a new rehab facility of 5000 sq ft at NCA for Rs. 5 Cr. Get well soon, champs!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja's knee? Hope Doctor Sharma is on it. Heard Bumrah's back is still troubling him. Recover quickly, paaji! Our World Cup hopes depend on it. This is worse than waiting in line at the Tirupati temple. Need them fit for the match at Wankhede. Heard they are building a new rehab facility of five thousand square feet at N C A for rupee five crore. Get well soon, champs!
